## booleanType() function

Create a union of boolean literals (i.e. `true | false`<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function booleanType<T extends boolean[]>(...value: T): IUnionType<BooleanLiterals<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | <code>...boolean[]</code> A list of number literals |

<b>Returns:</b>

[IUnionType](./tscgen.iuniontype.md)<!-- -->&lt;[BooleanLiterals](./tscgen.booleanliterals.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;
